name: PUPSRC-OTMS
description: A full-stack web application for managing student transactions for PUPSRC's faculties online. Powered by Bootstrap and PHP.

name: e-Dukaxon
description: Android application for training and assessing Filipino dyslexics. Written in Flutter/Dart.

name: PUPSRC-iMHealth
description: Full-stack web application for monitoring and analyzing mental health assessments of PUPSRC students. Written in Next.js.

name: Philippine Travel Maps Collection
description: Collection of maps of different Philippine provinces that users can add travel status on and share on social media. Written in React.

name: Kessoku Band Fan-site
description: Website in dedication to the anime, Bocchi the Rock. Written in Jquery.
